entry.summary: ...LAKE-EFFECT SNOW SHOWERS WILL RESULT IN HAZARDOUS TRAVEL CONDITIONS IN THE SNOWBELT THROUGH MID-MORNING... .Lake-effect snow showers will gradually decrease this morning as winds over western Lake Superior slowly turn to a more westerly direction.
